author: ratz
title: a little flimsy
review: for a building site vehicle this dumper seems a little too small, also it falls apart too easily. the set is an uninspired reissue of 6652, which i can recommend instead, because it's a little bigger, has more parts, and makes an overall stable impression. so if you don't have this set, just let it be, it's not worth an effort - get 6652.

author: hustla187
title: A Good Dump
review: This is actually a cool set. It has a bed that can dump some cargo like trash or dirt. I think the front slightly needs work and should include a windshield and car doors. Besides that, this is a good set.

author: suckerpunch83
title: A Little Small
review:
Picked up this set for one reason mainly: because I didn't own it already. The truck itself is small, but has some unique pieces including the black hinge plate and dump box (although small). 

If the truck had a cab on the front, it would be a little more appealing. Can't go wrong with doors and a windshield. 

All in all a nice addition to any collection.
